sqlQuery.name: SequencesByOrganismAbbrev
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct source_id from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p where org_abbrev = $$organismAbbrev$$

sqlQuery.name: organismAbbrevs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct o.abbrev as internal, o.abbrev as term from apidb.organism o

sqlQuery.name: PartitionKeys
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, org_abbrev as partition_key from apidbtuning.GenomicSeqOrgAbbrev

sqlQuery.name: SequenceAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sequence as source_id, id as old_source_id from webready.GenomicSequenceId_p where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, organism as organism_full, genbank_accession, organism, case when (sequence_description) is not null then sequence_description when (chromosome is not null) then organism || ' - Chromosome ' || chromosome_order_num else organism end as description, replace(sequence_type, '_', ' ') as sequence_type from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Organisms
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, organism from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: Aliases
sqlQuery.sql: select si.sequence as source_id, si.id as seq_id from webready.GenomicSequenceId_p si where org_abbrev in (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: UserCommentIDs
sqlQuery.sql: select c.stable_id as source_id, c.comment_id from @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@MappedComment mc, @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments c where mc.comment_id = c.comment_id and c.comment_target_id = 'genome' and mc.review_status_id != 'rejected' and mc.is_visible = true

sqlQuery.name: UserCommentContent
sqlQuery.sql: select tsc.stable_id as source_id, tsc.cntnt from @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@MappedComment mc, (select stable_id, comment_target_id, c.comment_id, concat(headline, '|', content, '|', first_name, ' ', last_name, '(', organization, ')', authors) as cntnt from @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@comments c left join @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@comment_users u on c.user_id = u.user_id left join (select comment_id, string_agg(source_id, ', ' order by source_id) as authors from @REMOTE_COMMENT_SCHEMA@CommentReference where database_name = 'author' group by comment_id) a on a.comment_id = c.comment_id ) tsc where mc.comment_id = tsc.comment_id and tsc.comment_target_id = 'genome' and mc.review_status_id != 'rejected' and mc.is_visible = true
